description: Summary of each variable in the 'vote_income' data frame based on its class and contents.

county.description: The county (直轄市、縣或市) where the village is located.

town.description: The town (鄉、鎮、市或區) where the village is located.

dpp.description: Vote share of the Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) in the 2024 election.

kmt.description: Vote share of the Kuomintang (KMT) in the 2024 election.

tpp.description: Vote share of the Taiwan People's Party (TPP) in the 2024 election.

npp.description: Vote share of the New Power Party (NPP) in the 2024 election.

median.description: Median income in the village in 2021.

sd.description: Standard deviation of income in the village in 2021.
